QuestData.Title: Full of Hot Water
QuestData.Description: Ergll indicated that you should be able to use the Engorged Azshara Sea Sponge to summon a "jumbo" elemental near the Tower of Eldara to the northeast.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Alternative recreational uses for scalding water elementals have proven too dangerous to pursue on a commercial level.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Globe of Boiling Water from a Scalding Water Lord at the Tower of Eldara.
QuestData.RewardText: Convenient, no? Who needs hot springs anyway. This is perfect.
